text: Helmut Fottner (24 December 1927 – 1 September 2009) was a German footballer who played for TSV 1860 Munich, SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken, Rot-Weiss Essen, Sportclub Enschede, GVAV and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2009 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:TSV 1860 Munich players Category:SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken players Category:Rot-Weiss Essen players Category:Sportclub Enschede players Category:FC Groningen players Category:Association football forwards Category:German expatriate footballers Category:German expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Footballers from Munich
title: Helmut Fottner
